text: Mikalai Sharlap (born 30 March 1994) is a Belarusian rower. He won the silver medal in the coxless four at the 2016 European Rowing Championships. ==References== ==External links== Category:Belarusian male rowers Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Rowers at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic rowers of Belarus Category:European Rowing Championships medalists
title: Mikalai Sharlap
